short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly copy the full HTML code of an active page to the clipboard with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FOX copypage extension allows users to copy the full HTML code of an active web page to the clipboard in a fast and convenient way. This allows you to easily transfer the content of pages to editors, analyze them or use them in your projects.
